X.ii.3.D.1.h
.
Preparing and Sending a Final Rating Decision
If no additional evidence is submitted or if the submitted evidence does not change the proposed action
prepare a final rating implementing the proposal, and
notify the beneficiary of the decision.
References
:Â  For more information on the
required elements of a final decision notice, see
M21-1, Part VI, Subpart i, 1.B.1.b
signature requirements for rating decisions proposing and finalizing reduction or discontinuance of benefits due to error under
38 CFR 3.105(a)
, see
M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, 5.A.3.e
, and
process for making competency determinations, see
M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, 6.A.3
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section D - Completing Proposed Rating Decisions
citation: Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section D
